1.1.1.Name: Non-text Content
1.1.1.SUP: Web page provides text alternatives for all non-text content.

DNS.TextAlternative: Some images do not have a text alternative
DNS.NonTextName: Some elements accepting user input do not have a text alternative
DNS.Captcha: Some captcha elements do not have a text alternative
DNS.NonTextDecorative: Some decorative elements are not hidden from assistive technologies. However there are problems in an element attributes

1.1.1.NA: There is no non-text content on the web page

1.2.1.Name: Audio-only and Video-only (Prerecorded)
1.2.1.SUP: Video and audio content on the page is captioned properly

DNS.AudioOnlyAlternative: Some audio content does not have captions
DNS.VideoOnlyAlternative: Some video content does not have captions

1.2.1.NA: There is no video or audio content on the web page

1.2.2.Name: Captions (Prerecorded)
1.2.2.SUP: Captions are provided for all prerecorded audio content

DNS.Captions: Some prerecorded audio content is not supplied with captions

1.2.2.NA: There is no audio or video content on the web page

1.2.3.Name: Audio Description or Media Alternative (Prerecorded)
1.2.3.SUP: An alternative for time-based media or audio description of the prerecorded video content is provided for synchronized media

DNS.Alternative: Some video content is not provided with an alternative for time-based media or audio description

1.2.3.NA: There is no prerecorded video content

1.2.5.Name: Audio Description (Prerecorded)
1.2.5.SUP: Audio description is provided for all prerecorded video content in synchronized media.

DNS.Alternative: Some video content is not provided with audio description

1.2.5.NA: There are no prerecorded video content

1.3.1.Name: Info and Relationships
1.3.1.SUP: Information, structure, and relationships conveyed through presentation can be programmatically determined or are available in text

DNS.NoLabel: Some elements which require user input are not supplied with visible labels
DNS.NotWorks: Some elements which like edit box, don't works
DNS.Purpose: Purpose of some elements is different from its semantic markup
DNS.Table: Some table elements have incorrect semantic markup
DNS.Markup: Some web page elements have incorrect semantic markup
DNS.AriaMarkup: Some web page elements have incorrect ARIA-attributes

1.3.1.NA: There is no such elements on the web page

1.3.4.Name: Orientation
1.3.4.SUP: Web page is viewable in any orientation

DNS.CssLock: Web page orientation is locked by CSS

1.3.4.NA: Unable to determine if orientation changes

1.4.1.Name: Use of Color
1.4.1.SUP: Color is not used as the only visual means of conveying information

DNS.LinkColor: Some links are only distinguishable from surrounding text by color

1.4.1.NA: There are no elements that might be checked for this criterion

DNS.Contrast: Some elements have insufficient contrast to the background

1.4.4.Name: Resize text

DNS.Scaling: Text cannot be scaled or zoomed

1.4.4.NA: There is no text on the Web page

1.4.12.Name: Text Spacing
1.4.12.SUP: Text spacing adheres to the guidelines

DNS.StylesheetSpasing: Inline text spacing is not adjustable with custom stylesheets

1.4.12.NA: There is no text that support style properties described in criterion

2.1.1.Name: Keyboard
2.1.1.SUP: All functionality of the content is operable through a keyboard interface without requiring specific timings for individual keystrokes

DNS.DropdownActivation: The dropdown can not be expanded by keyboard
DNS.DropdownNavigation: Navigation through a dropdown items is not supported
DNS.SelectorConfirmation: The selection option cannot be chosen using keyboard
DNS.FocusLoop: Navigation through a group of elements is not looped
DNS.SliderByKeyboard: Some elements such as sliders do not work when used keyboard

2.1.1.NA: There are no elements that might be checked for this criterion

2.2.1.Name: Timing Adjustable

DNS.Countdown: Page has element that refreshing every 3 sec element

2.2.1.NA: There is no time-limited content on the page

2.2.2.Name: Pause, Stop, Hide

DNS.StopButton: There is scrolling content which cannot be paused, stopped or hidden by the user
DNS.Blink: There are <blink> elements which cannot be paused, stopped or hidden by the user
DNS.Marquee: There are <marque> elements which cannot be paused, stopped or hidden by the user
DNS.Flicker: There are animated images over 5 seconds long that can't be paused or stopped
DNS.Size: Size flickering image on page more than 25% off size page

2.2.2.NA: There is no moving, scrolling or auto-updating content

DNS.Flash: Web page contain images that flash more than three times in any one second period

2.4.1.Name: Bypass Blocks
2.4.1.SUP: A mechanism is available to bypass blocks of content that are repeated on multiple Web pages

DNS.BypassMain: Web page does not have a <main> landmark for bypass mechanism
DNS.BypassTitle: Some elements used in the bypass mechanism have invalid attributes

2.4.1.NA: No content is repeated on multiple Web pages

2.4.2.Name: Page Titled
2.4.2.SUP: Web pages have titles that describe topic or purpose

DNS.Title: Page titles do not describe the content
DNS.Heading: Headings do not describe the content

2.4.2.NA: There are no page headings or titles

2.4.3.Name: Focus Order

DNS.Order: User interface elements on the Web Page have incorrect focus order

2.4.3.NA: There are no user interface elements on the Web Page

2.4.4.Name: Link Purpose (In Context)

DNS.PurposeInContext: Some links does not have a description

2.4.4.NA: There are no links on the page

2.4.6.Name: Headings and Labels
2.4.6.SUP: Headings and labels are descriptive throughout the web page.

DNS.PurposeUI: Some elements do not have a heading or a label or its purpose is uninformative

2.4.6.NA: There are no elements with headings or labels

2.4.7.Name: Focus Visible

DNS.FocusSize: Some elements have scrollable content not accessible by keyboard

2.4.7.NA: There are no keyboard operable user interface elements

DNS.PointerCancellation: Some elements don't have pointer cancellation functionality

2.5.3.Name: Label in Name
2.5.3.SUP: Label names match the content presented visually

DNS.Mismatch: Label names do not match the content presented visually

2.5.3.NA: There are no labels on the page

3.1.1.Name: Language of Page
3.1.1.SUP: The default human language of each Web page can be programmatically determined

DNS.Lang: <html> element does not have a lang attribute
DNS.LangValid: <html> element has an invalid lang attribute value
DNS.LangMismatch: <html> elements with lang and xml:lang have different base language

3.1.2.Name: Language of Parts
3.1.2.SUP: Languages different from the page language are marked correctly

DNS.LangValid: Some text elements have invalid 'lang' attribute

3.1.2.NA: There are no elements with content in a different language

DNS.ErrorIdentification: Some elements don't have alert or have alert with bad description

3.3.2.Name: Labels or Instructions
3.3.2.SUP: Labels or instructions are provided when content requires user input
3.3.2.NA: There are no elements which require user input

4.1.1.Name: Parsing

DNS.DuplicateId: Some user interface elements have a non-unique ID
DNS.DuplicateIdValue: Some common elements have a non-unique ID
DNS.DuplicateIdAria: Some ARIA ID values are not unique

4.1.1.NA: There are no elements on the Web page

4.1.2.Name: Name, Role, Value
4.1.2.SUP: Elements' names and roles are appropriate

DNS.Role: Role of some elements cannot be programmatically determined
DNS.Name: Name of some elements cannot be programmatically determined
DNS.Attributes: Some elements have invalid ARIA attributes

4.1.2.NA: There are no user interface components
